New Records: LaMelo Ball is on pace to shatter Russell Westbrook's record of 10.0 points per contest in the fourth stanza
Key Match Events: The Hornets secured a 103-83 blowout win against the Indiana Pacers
LaMelo Ball scored 17 points in the last 12 minutes of the match
The team's defense held the Pacers to just two points in the third quarter
Pre-Game Insights: There are no pre-game insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: The Hornets' win may have helped them get out of a recurring theme of slow starts this season
The team will need LaMelo Ball to continue delivering in crunch time
Miscellaneous Highlights: LaMelo Ball is leading the league in fourth-quarter scoring in the 2024-25 campaign with 11.1 points per game
He is shooting 58.2 percent from the field and 50.0 percent from long distance during the final period
Others: The article mentions that Brandon Miller carried the team on his shoulders from the third quarter to the end of the stanza, scoring 17 of Charlotte's 23 points
